chrome.notes: Until Chrome 110, the `object-src` directive was required with a secure source. From Chrome 111, the `object-src` directive is optional.

notes: Firefox does not support `http://127.0.0.1'` or `http://localhost` as script sources; they must be served over HTTPS.
Until Firefox 105, the `object-src` directive was required with a secure source. From Firefox 106, the `object-src` directive is optional.

safari.notes: There is no requirement to include the `object-src` directive.

safari_ios.notes: There is no requirement to include the `object-src` directive.

notes: Available for use in Manifest V3 or later.
Until Chrome 110, the `object-src` directive was required with a secure source. From Chrome 111, the `object-src` directive is optional.

firefox.notes: Until Firefox 105, the `object-src` directive was required with a secure source. From Firefox 106, the `object-src` directive is optional.

notes: Available for use in Manifest V3 or later.
There is no requirement to include the `object-src` directive.
